nodes.name: Add FolderIDs for Return
nodes.notes: Adds folderIDs array back after clean registry write. Prevents array corruption in Google Sheets while still providing folderIDs to calling workflow for UNKNOWN client path.

parameters.jsCode:
const folderIds = $input.first().json;
const clientName = folderIds.Client_Name || '';
const clientNormalized = clientName.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, '_');

// Map all 37 folder IDs to Client_Tracker columns
const trackerRow = {
  Client_Name: clientName,
  '01_Expose': folderIds['01_Expose'] || '',
  '02_Grundbuch': folderIds['02_Grundbuch'] || '',
  '03_Calculation': folderIds['03_Calculation'] || '',
  '04_Exit_Strategy': folderIds['04_Exit_Strategy'] || '',
  '05_Offer': folderIds['05_Offer'] || '',
  '06_Acceptance': folderIds['06_Acceptance'] || '',
  '07_Notary_Contracts': folderIds['07_Notary_Contracts'] || '',
  '08_Financing': folderIds['08_Financing'] || '',
  '09_Due_Diligence': folderIds['09_Due_Diligence'] || '',
  '10_Technical_Due_Diligence': folderIds['10_Technical_Due_Diligence'] || '',
  '11_Legal_Due_Diligence': folderIds['11_Legal_Due_Diligence'] || '',
  '12_Completion': folderIds['12_Completion'] || '',
  '13_Handover': folderIds['13_Handover'] || '',
  '14_Backlog': folderIds['14_Backlog'] || '',
  '15_Scheduling': folderIds['15_Scheduling'] || '',
  '16_Project_Coordination': folderIds['16_Project_Coordination'] || '',
  '17_Accounting': folderIds['17_Accounting'] || '',
  '18_Communication_Client': folderIds['18_Communication_Client'] || '',
  '19_Permits': folderIds['19_Permits'] || '',
  '20_Budget_Tracking': folderIds['20_Budget_Tracking'] || '',
  '21_Progress_Photos': folderIds['21_Progress_Photos'] || '',
  '22_Quality_Control': folderIds['22_Quality_Control'] || '',
  '23_Marketing': folderIds['23_Marketing'] || '',
  '24_Tenant_Management': folderIds['24_Tenant_Management'] || '',
  '25_Property_Management': folderIds['25_Property_Management'] || '',
  '26_Sales_Preparation': folderIds['26_Sales_Preparation'] || '',
  '27_Sales_Coordination': folderIds['27_Sales_Coordination'] || '',
  '28_Exit_Docs': folderIds['28_Exit_Docs'] || '',
  '29_Archive': folderIds['29_Archive'] || '',
  '30_Meetings': folderIds['30_Meetings'] || '',
  '31_Reports': folderIds['31_Reports'] || '',
  '32_Contracts': folderIds['32_Contracts'] || '',
  '33_Invoices': folderIds['33_Invoices'] || '',
  '34_Correspondence': folderIds['34_Correspondence'] || '',
  '35_Risk_Management': folderIds['35_Risk_Management'] || '',
  '36_Insurance': folderIds['36_Insurance'] || '',
  '37_Others': folderIds['37_Others'] || '',
  Status_Expose: '',
  Status_Grundbuch: '',
  Status_Calculation: '',
  Status_Exit_Strategy: '',
  Last_Updated: new Date().toISOString()
};

return {
  json: trackerRow
};
